mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_list_tb (is_notice, po_title, po_content) VALUES (#{is_notice}, #{po_title}, #{po_content});
INSERT INTO filestore_tb (idx_filetype, idx_ref, origin_name, file_name, upload_datetime) VALUES ( 3, #{post_id}, #{origin_name}, #{file_name}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_id, p.is_notice, p.po_title, p.po_view_count, p.written_datetime
FROM post_list_tb p LEFT JOIN filestore_tb f ON p.post_id = f.idx_ref ORDER BY p.post_id DESC;
